original: Unlike other large U.S. airlines which mostly use hub-and-spoke systems, Southwest uses point-to-point operations and underwent a massive crew scheduling "meltdown" because most of its pilots and flight attendants were out of position, which resulted in massive numbers of flight cancellations persisting for days after the worst weather had subsided and other airlines had largely recovered.

original: A winter storm causes record-breaking low temperatures and leaves more than 80 people dead across North America.
simplified: A winter storm left more than 80 people dead across North America because of record-breaking low temperatures.

original: The 2022 Peruvian political protests correspond to a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the ousted president of Peru, Pedro Castillo, organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples who felt they experienced political disenfranchisement, specifically from the politically left-wing to far left.
simplified: In 2022, protests were held in Peru. || Supporters of the ousted president, Pedro Castillo, organized them. || People from the left and far left sides of the political spectrum felt they were politically ignored and discriminated against.

original: The 2022 Peruvian political protests correspond to a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the ousted president of Peru, Pedro Castillo, organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples who felt they experienced political disenfranchisement, specifically from the politically left-wing to far left.
simplified: The 2022 Peruvian political protests are a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the president of Peru, Pedro Castillo. || They are organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples who feel they experienced political disenfranchisement.

original: The 2022 Peruvian political protests correspond to a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the ousted president of Peru, Pedro Castillo, organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples who felt they experienced political disenfranchisement, specifically from the politically left-wing to far left.
simplified: The 2022 Peruvian political protests will be held on the same day as a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the former president of Peru, Pedro Castillo. || The demonstrations were organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples.

original: The 2022 Peruvian political protests correspond to a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the ousted president of Peru, Pedro Castillo, organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples who felt they experienced political disenfranchisement, specifically from the politically left-wing to far left.
simplified: The 2022 Peruvian protests were led by supporters of removed president Pedro Castillo, who consisted of people that felt abandoned by their government, specifically by left-wing politicians.

original: The 2022 Peruvian political protests correspond to a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the ousted president of Peru, Pedro Castillo, organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples who felt they experienced political disenfranchisement, specifically from the politically left-wing to far left.
simplified: Protests against the 2022 Peruvian government are being held by people who feel they have been shut out of the political process, particularly those who are left-wing to far left. || These demonstrations, which are in support of the ousted Peruvian president, Pedro Castillo, are being organized by social organizations and indigenous populations.

original: The 2022 Peruvian political protests correspond to a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the ousted president of Peru, Pedro Castillo, organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples who felt they experienced political disenfranchisement, specifically from the politically left-wing to far left.
simplified: Pedro Castillo was kicked out as president of Peru. || His supporters felt their political rights were taken away by left-wing and far-left groups. || As a result, social organizations and native peoples organized many demonstrations, known as the 2022 Peruvian political protests.

original: The 2022 Peruvian political protests correspond to a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the ousted president of Peru, Pedro Castillo, organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples who felt they experienced political disenfranchisement, specifically from the politically left-wing to far left.
simplified: The 2022 Peruvian political protests were a series of demonstrations called by supporters of the ousted president of Peru, Pedro Castillo. || It was organized by social organizations and indigenous peoples who felt they experienced political disenfranchisement, specifically from the politically left-wing to far left.

original: Further important aspects of Fungi in Art relate to preservation of artworks from fungal decay and contamination, as well as initiatives fostering and supporting works able to stimulate dialogues between mycologists (fungal researchers), artists, and society (as for example from the 'Massee Art Grant' by the British Mycological Society or works encouraged and supported by the Fungi Foundation).
simplified: Fungi play an important role in art in terms of preventing fungal decay and contamination of works, as well as creating opportunities for dialogue between mycologists, artists, and the public. || Examples of such projects include the British Mycological Society's 'Massee Art Grant' and the Fungi Foundation's initiatives.

original: Further important aspects of Fungi in Art relate to preservation of artworks from fungal decay and contamination, as well as initiatives fostering and supporting works able to stimulate dialogues between mycologists (fungal researchers), artists, and society (as for example from the 'Massee Art Grant' by the British Mycological Society or works encouraged and supported by the Fungi Foundation).
simplified: Fungi in Art is important for its role in preserving artworks from fungal decay and contamination. || It also supports dialogues between mycologists, artists, and society through initiatives like the 'Massee Art Grant' by the British Mycological Society and other projects supported by the Fungi Foundation.

original: Further important aspects of Fungi in Art relate to preservation of artworks from fungal decay and contamination, as well as initiatives fostering and supporting works able to stimulate dialogues between mycologists (fungal researchers), artists, and society (as for example from the 'Massee Art Grant' by the British Mycological Society or works encouraged and supported by the Fungi Foundation).
simplified: An important aspect of Fungi in Art is the protection of artwork from fungal damage. || Another important aspect is to make sure mycologists, artists, and society are all on the same page.
